PHRASE.LANG: He might not be that lazy legendary cat from the past, but he sure looks like him. [#Legal]
Ce n'est peut-être pas le gros chat orange fainéant que tout le monde connaît, mais il lui ressemble. [#Legal]
Er ist vielleicht nicht dieser faule, legendäre Kater von früher, aber er sieht ihm doch sehr ähnlich. [#Legal]
Non è quel celebre gatto pigrone che tutti conosciamo, ma gli si avvicina davvero molto. [#Legal]
Podrá no ser ese legendario gato perezoso del pasado, pero se le parece mucho. [#Legal]
과거에 유명했던 전설적인 주황색 고양이는 아니지만, 약간 닮은 구석이 있는 것 같지 않나요? [#Legal]
He might not be that lazy legendary cat from the past, but he sure looks like him. [#Legal]
牠大概不是那隻傳奇的懶惰貓，但牠的外型肯定很像。 [#Legal]
牠大概不是那隻傳奇的懶惰貓，但牠的外型肯定很像。 [#Legal]
He might not be that lazy legendary cat from the past, but he sure looks like him. [#Legal]
